mapper.select: select b.ic_card_id,a.ic_number as staff_ic_number,b.id,b.type,b.school_id,b.name,b.phone,b.qrcode_url,b.qrcode_url_old, b.qrcode_school_key,b.qrcode_school_key_old,b.sign_type_id,b.status,b.created,b.updated,b.deleted from tb_staff b left join (select * from tb_ic_card where deleted=0 and school_id=#{school_id} and ic_type=1) a on b.rfid=a.rfid where b.type=31 and b.school_id=#{school_id} and b.deleted=0

select b.ic_card_id,a.ic_number as staff_ic_number,b.id,b.type,b.school_id,b.name,b.phone,b.qrcode_url,b.qrcode_url_old, b.qrcode_school_key,b.qrcode_school_key_old,b.sign_type_id,b.status,b.created,b.updated,b.deleted from tb_staff b left join (select * from tb_ic_card where deleted=0 and school_id=#{school_id} and ic_type=1) a on b.rfid=a.rfid where b.type in (33,34) and b.school_id=#{school_id} and b.deleted=0

select a.ic_card_id,a.*,d.ic_number as staff_ic_number,tmp1.title,tmp1.class_id as classId from tb_staff a left join (select b.*,c.title from tb_staff_class b,tb_class c where b.class_id=c.id) tmp1 on a.id=tmp1.staff_id left join (select * from tb_ic_card where deleted=0 and school_id=#{schoolId} and ic_type=1) d on a.rfid=d.rfid where a.deleted=0 and a.school_id=#{schoolId} and a.name like #{name}

select tmp1.ic_card_id,tmp1.*,d.ic_number as staff_ic_number from (select a.ic_card_id,a.rfid,a.id,a.type,a.school_id,a.name,a.phone,a.qrcode_url, a.qrcode_school_key,a.sign_type_id,a.status,a.created,a.updated,a.deleted from tb_staff a where a.type=31 and a.name like #{name} and a.school_id=#{schoolId} and a.deleted=0) tmp1 left join (select * from tb_ic_card where deleted=0 and school_id=#{schoolId} and ic_type=1) d on tmp1.rfid=d.rfid

select tmp1.ic_card_id,tmp1.*,d.ic_number as staff_ic_number from (select a.ic_card_id,a.rfid,a.id,a.type,a.school_id,a.name,a.phone,a.qrcode_url, a.qrcode_school_key,a.sign_type_id,a.status,a.created,a.updated,a.deleted from tb_staff a where a.type in(33,34) and a.name like #{name} and a.school_id=#{schoolId} and a.deleted=0) tmp1 left join (select * from tb_ic_card where deleted=0 and school_id=#{schoolId} and ic_type=1) d on tmp1.rfid=d.rfid

select MAX(a.id),a.name,b.title as phone from tb_staff a left join tb_school b on a.school_id = b.id where a.rfid=#{rfid} and a.deleted=0
and a.id <> #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_staff AS a SET a.rfid="",a.ic_card_id=0 WHERE a.rfid=#{rfid}
